io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.net.packet

Class AmbientPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.net.packet.AmbientPacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetPacket, java.io.Serializable

    public class AmbientPacket
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetPacket
    Packet used for ambient sound events.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
